1.name: Nature's Wrath
1.details:
When Pathfinder basic attacks or hits enemy Hero with Quick Release 4 times, Pathfinder will send an extra arrow, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and creating a field around the target.

Pathfinder gains increased attack speed and movement speed while on the field.

2.name: Quick Release
2.details: Pathfinder dashes in a target direction and shoots an arrow to a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power). This arrow counts as basic attack and prioritises enemy Hero.

3.name: Volley
3.details: Pathfinder gains the ability to shoot 3 arrows instead of 1 on her basic attack and Quick Release, dealing a percentage of her basic attack's damage to 2 other nearby enemies, prioritising enemy Heroes.

4.name: Hail of Arrows
4.details: Pathfinder leaps back and shoots out a hail of arrow at a target area, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and slowing all enemies on top.

5.name: Piercing Arrows
5.details:
Pathfinder gains increased attack range on her basic attack and other abilities.

In addition, each basic attack or Quick Release will pierce through the enemy, dealing additional physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit.
